Html:
Is there an function to paste existing html into the RTE at startup and view it in the Textview?

Short Question , hu? ;-)

Hi ren,

If you set the Text property to whatever html you want to see that should work.

E.g.
protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
     rte.Text = "<STRONG>Hi Ren!</STRONG></BR><I>Tags have disappeared</I>";
}

Hope this helps!
Greg

Thank you, IÂ´ve figured it out.

just added a funktion

function PasteExisting(result)
{
    richeditor.GetDocument().body.textContent= result;
}


into the startup.js , so I can call it by script

Thanks anyway

Ren
